#summary Miscellaneous
CocoaSharp is admittedly light on documentation at this point. For more information about CocoaSharp, please see the following resources:

	* The CocoaSharp mailing list mailto:cocoa-sharp@lists.ximian.com.
	* Xcode project by Dru http://www.druware.com/products/xcodetools.html
	* "#cocoa# irc channel on irc.gnome.org":irc://irc.gnome.org/cocoa#.
